nodes.bodyText: You changed this here, but the file is still io.openliberty.jaxb in reality.  Also JaxbToolsMessages should be changed as well it would seem.
Should the TR_GROUP also be updated?

I think this is going a bit too far. There are still plenty of classes that start with Jaxb in the XML Binding APIs.  If the spec project didn't need to rename their classes, I don't see why we would have to.

I think now with the other changes you made you can do:
-files=\
  bin/xmlBinding/xjc.bat, \
  bin/xmlBinding/tools/ws-schemagen.jar, \
  bin/xmlBinding/schemagen; ibm.executable:=true; ibm.file.encoding:=ebcdic, \
  bin/xmlBinding/xjc; ibm.executable:=true; ibm.file.encoding:=ebcdic, \
  bin/xmlBinding/tools/ws-xjc.jar, \
  bin/xmlBinding/schemagen.bat

-IBM-ShortName: jaxb-3.0
+IBM-ShortName: xmlBinding-3.0
 IBM-Process-Types: client, \
  server
 Subsystem-Name: Jakarta XML Bindings 3.0
